attributes.action: Ban excess plastic for marketing purposes that make a product appear bigger
attributes.additional_details:
It is wasteful using excess plastic that is harmful for our planet.

It is also dishonest and misleading for consumers
attributes.background: It should be illegal for companies, in particular in the cosmetics and pharmaceutical world to enhance the exterior packaging of a product that makes it appear you are getting good value for money.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552450
